[File: aptos-core/execution/executor/src/db_bootstrapper/mod.rs] [Function: get_state_timestamp()] [CORE_CODE_ADDRESS trust] The function trusts data from CORE_CODE_ADDRESS. Can compromise of system accounts allow arbitrary timestamp manipulation affecting consensus timing? (Critical)
